Hello guys and gals,

I was wondering if you would consider adding Soundcloud BB tags to the forums. That'd enable us (users who compose music, soundtracks, etc) to embed these tracks in the streamlined and accessible way that the SC widget makes possible. Would make it easier to show, share, and discuss our sounds, as well as having them as signature -- all without having to leave the page we're on. (and side note here: The sound community on this forum could use a little help )

Anyway , creating this custom [soundcloud] or [sc] tag seems to be pretty straightforward, as explained in 5 steps here.

It would look something like this:

Cheers!
Using them as signatures mightn't work if the widgets are too tall... but yeah, I agree this'd be pretty cool.

Nah, it's quite customisable. Been seeing it around music forums in sigs it fits very nicely. About the size of your sig banner in height. But anyway, who do we have to bug for it to be implemented it's really simple to do and would only take a little while to set up so... )

Cheers!
That would be KasperVld, ehehehe. Go bug him directly, if need be. He could probably get it set up quickly enough. I'll go see if he's on IRC...

Any updates on this? And I really don't want to bug people (especially very busy ones!) ... But do you say I should try directly contacting KasperVld then ?

Cheers! And thanks for your time
